channel.title: Worlf Of Destiny [Hyperion]
channel.description:
hello, I was thinking about a Sort of runescape remake With our own Things
Like: Not 4 exp per hit But more. all shops But some edited Ner quest tab Like that stuff
Things need to be done: A COol quest tab with clicking things:P all skills need to work (mostly work) Try to get all Doors/Stairs Working :O 2 Worlds p2p(member) and f2p(free) Client side is 70% done with switching :D Server 0% LOL! all Main features Like runescape's all drops All Npcs Are added :) Npc test Etc..
Intresting to join our team?? Destinypking@hotmail.com
We need: Server Coder Client Coder Forum Editor (Already Bought a host for 1 year:) And Im planning to buy a 4gb ram vps for 2 month:):)
Pictures Commming Soon

item.title: Worlf Of Destiny [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

Remember to fix Hyperions memory leak.

Lol, besides the event manager problem, there are only as many leaks as you code into it.

A word of advice, don’t use hyperion because you think its cool, or you think you will be respected for it. It is very easy to make gigantic problems (memory leaks, bugs) on this source, merely by attempting to use it incorrectly.

If you use hyperion, do it because you want to. Personally IMO, hyperion is over-rated, bulky, and not very enjoyable to use.

Read full topic
